name: Create new LionDesk contacts from Airtable records when triggered by a Webhook
description:
Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically use the output of the webhook to retrieve a record from Airtable and validate the email using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will create a record in LionDesk.
The webhook should have a field "id" otherwise the scenario will not be triggered.
